definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

pinyin: fa1 re4 ban4 xue4 xiao3 ban3 jian3 shao3 zong1 he2 zheng1
containing_words.word: 發熱伴血小板減少綜合徵

sentences.english: In addition, rutin had the effect of raising the platelet count.
sentences.chinese: 另外，蘆丁具有增加小鼠血小板總數的作用。

sentences.english: Others have shown garlic prevents platelet aggregation and reduces high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 其他資料提出大蒜防止血小板凝聚，減少高血壓。

sentences.english: It is simply a matter of decreasing sequestration and destruction of platelet.
sentences.chinese: 這是減少血小板的隔離與破壞這麼簡單的一個問題。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the pathogenesis of thrombocytopenic purpura caused by sodium valproate treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討丙戊酸鈉致血小板減少性紫癜可能發生機制。

sentences.english: Tomato juice is promising in the anti-platelet therapy.
sentences.chinese: 西紅柿汁具有潛在的抗血小板治療前景。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic effects of platelet transfusion in acute leukemic patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性白血病患者反覆輸注血小板的治療效果。

sentences.english: The results showed that pilocarpine was also an inhibitor of platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 結果發現毛果芸香鹼也是血小板聚集的抑制劑。

sentences.english: Additionally, thrombomodulin can entirely inhibit thrombin and ristocetin-induced platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 能完全抑制由凝血酶和瑞斯托黴素誘導的血小板聚集。

sentences.english: The amount of 51 Cr labeled platelet of the two groups was counted 24 hours postoperatively.
sentences.chinese: 術後24小時，取靜脈橋測定標記血小板數。

sentences.english: But birds don't have ‘em, nor do reptiles or fish.
sentences.chinese: 但是鳥類沒有血小板，爬行動物和魚類也沒有。

sentences.english: Below the mother-in-law's pressure, zhang Wei plaque is low still take a risk parturient.
sentences.chinese: 在婆婆的壓力下，張薇血小板低仍冒險生子。

sentences.english: Thrombocytopenia is one of the most common bleeding disorders of animals.
sentences.chinese: 血小板減少症是動物最常見的出血性疾病之一。

sentences.english: Objective:The primary blood platelet reduction hemacelinosis is one kind of common hemorrhage disease.
sentences.chinese: 原發性血小板減少性紫癜是一種常見的出血疾病。

sentences.english: In diabetes patients, platelets are more sticky.
sentences.chinese: 而糖尿病患者的血小板則更爲粘着。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of platelet-derived growth factor receptor in the development of scleroderma fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血小板衍生生長因子在硬皮病發病中的作用。

sentences.english: The peak value of platelet intracellular calcium oscillations was diminished.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸腺苷誘導的血小板鈣波動峯值降低。

definition: hematin (blood pigment)/heme/hemoglobin/also written 血紅蛋白|血红蛋白
neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)
hemogram/picture of blood used in medical research
hemolysis (breakdown of red blood cells leading to anemia)
